subject: Football
Heisman Trophy
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Tim Tebow was in a new position yesterday, while Joe Paterno was back in his old one. On the first weekend of N.C.A.A. Division I college football this season, both were successful.
snippet: Tim Tebow was in a new position yesterday, while Joe Paterno was back in his old one. On the first weekend of N.C.A.A. Division I college football this season, both were successful.
